subject: Re: The number of etch installations is rocketing...
body:
Josip Rodin wrote:

> Actually, it wouldn't be all that difficult. All we have to do is ask.
> I bet that most people would be happy to send us their logs if we asked them
> nicely.

Mine are available, too. Where do you want me to upload the files?

Regards from Germany,

Martin


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
